metadata.title: CVE-2019-8325 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in RubyGems 2.6 and later through 3.0.2. SinceGem::CommandManager#run calls alert_error without escaping, escape sequenceinjection is possible. (There are many ways to cause an error.)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8325` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jruby - 9.1.17.0-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jruby package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.1.17.0-3').
